channel.title: How do i add this!
channel.description:
ok i want to add a door that only mods/admins can get thru. how do i do this? PLZ HELP!!!!!
i want to also make a door closed... how do i do that? thank you very much! and evrey1 on my server thansk you!

item.title: How do i add this!
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

Dude first learn what a void /case is before u ask something…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add this!
item.dc:creator: @6aceofspades 6aceofspades
item.description:
@6aceofspades wrote:

newservermaker:

object case? do u mean object handler or object.class?

Erm… you probably should learn what your object case is before you try manipulating objects…
AKA
The parts in your client.java like

case ****: if (playerRights == 1) { teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; }else{
It looks like that (without the playerRights if you haven’t added it, it shouldn’t be on any cases yet), and can be found in your client.java

-Justin

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add this!
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

in your object case add something like

if(objectID == ****){ if(playerRights >= 1){ blabla, whatever you wanna do with this } else if(playerRights <= 0){ bloblo, the otherwise thing of above}

**** = the Id of the object
the blabla thing is where your teleport thingy must comes
the bloblo thing is the sendmessage thingy for non-server-mods

also if you want it to only make THAT one door to tele, add something like this with
the objectid == ****

&& objectX == ** && objectY == **

change the ** to the coords

Note: do not exactly copy this, since I did it out of the head you could get errors

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add this!
item.dc:creator: @6aceofspades 6aceofspades
item.description:
@6aceofspades wrote:

Not exactly sure, but it should be as simple as a playerrights command.
I’m not completely sure if it’s possible because I think all doors are linked to one id. So you could simply put a portal outside the door designed to tele into the building you want accessed.

-Justin
P.S. Sorry if this doesn’t help but at least I tried. :\

Read full topic
